content:
I'm running into an issue generating the downloadable image for you. Here’s what you can do **right now** to get this done manually:  

### **🛠 Quickest Fix: Manually Merge Images**
Since **Smallpdf split the file into four images**, here’s how to **combine them into a single scrollable image** quickly:  

1️⃣ **Use an Online Image Combiner:**  
   - Upload all four images to a free tool like:  
     🔹 **[PineTools](https://pinetools.com/merge-images)**  
     🔹 **[ILoveIMG](https://www.iloveimg.com/merge-images)**  
     🔹 **Canva (if you have an account)**  
   - Select **vertical merging** (stack the images top to bottom).  
   - Download the **final merged image**.  

2️⃣ **Post This Image in a Comment on LinkedIn**  
   - Drop a **pinned comment**:  
     > “🚀 AI’s breakdown: How this job can be 80% automated today.👇”  
   - Attach the **merged image** to the comment.  

🚀 **This will maximize engagement while keeping the original post strong.**  

Let me know if you need a **more detailed step-by-step for merging images manually!**
